QuestData.Title: The Games We Play
QuestData.Description: Do not worry about me. We have a bigger problem.$b$bI heard their leader around here somewhere during the attack. I have been keeping watch from here but I have not been able to see them. They must be using some sort of glamour to hide themselves.$b$bI have yet to meet a spriggan who can resist a game. If you find one eager to play and can win, then perhaps you can learn something about their leader.
QuestData.LogDescription: Win the game of wits by using emotes to correctly answer the Playful Trickster's riddles.
QuestData.RewardText: Very interesting. This will be quite useful.
